languages.text: "И вы туда же! Клянусь Золотым Троном и кровью всех мучеников — у меня даже подобных мыслей не возникало! Прошу, Ваша Светлость, не оскорбляйте меня подобными подозрениями".
"Not you too! I swear on the Golden Throne and the blood of all martyrs: I never even considered committing such an act! Please, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, do not insult me with such suspicions."
languages.original_text: "И вы туда же! Клянусь Золотым Троном и кровью всех мучеников — у меня даже подобных мыслей не возникало! Прошу, Ваша Светлость, не оскорбляйте меня подобными подозрениями".

traits.locale_text: "Not you too! I swear on the Golden Throne and the blood of all martyrs — I never even considered committing such an act! Please, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, do not insult me with such suspicions."
"Not you too! I swear on the Golden Throne and the blood of all martyrs — I never even considered committing such an act! Please, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, do not insult me with such suspicions."
"Not you too! I swear on the Golden Throne and the blood of all martyrs: I never even considered committing such an act! Please, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, do not insult me with such suspicions."

"Not you too! I swear on the Golden Throne and the blood of all martyrs: I never even considered committing such an act! Please, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, do not insult me with such suspicions."
"Not you too! I swear on the Golden Throne and the blood of all martyrs: I never even considered committing such an act! Please, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, do not insult me with such suspicions."

languages.text: "Fangt nicht Ihr auch noch damit an. Ich schwöre beim Goldenen Thron und beim Blut aller Märtyrer: Ich habe nie mit dem Gedanken gespielt, mich an etwas Derartigem zu beteiligen! Bitte, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, beleidigt mich nicht mit solchen Verdächtigungen."
languages.original_text: "Not you too! I swear on the Golden Throne and the blood of all martyrs: I never even considered committing such an act! Please, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, do not insult me with such suspicions."

traits.locale_text: "Fangt nicht Ihr auch noch damit an. Ich schwöre beim Goldenen Thron und beim Blut aller Märtyrer: Ich habe nie mit dem Gedanken gespielt, mich an etwas Derartigem zu beteiligen! Bitte, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, beleidigt mich nicht mit solchen Verdächtigungen."

languages.text: « Vous n'allez pas vous y mettre, vous aussi ! Je jure sur le Trône d'Or et sur le sang des martyrs que je n'ai même jamais songé à commettre un tel acte ! Je vous en conjure, Votre Seigneurie, ne m'insultez pas avec pareils soupçons. »
languages.original_text: "Not you too! I swear on the Golden Throne and the blood of all martyrs: I never even considered committing such an act! Please, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, do not insult me with such suspicions."

traits.locale_text: « Vous n'allez pas vous y mettre, vous aussi ! Je jure sur le Trône d'Or et sur le sang des martyrs que je n'ai même jamais songé à commettre un tel acte ! Je vous en conjure, Votre Seigneurie, ne m'insultez pas avec pareils soupçons. »

languages.text: «¡Usted también no! ¡Juro por el Trono Dorado y por la sangre de todos los mártires que ni se me ha pasado por la cabeza cometer semejante fechoría! Por favor, {mf|milord|milady}, no me insulte con semejantes sospechas».
languages.original_text: "Not you too! I swear on the Golden Throne and the blood of all martyrs: I never even considered committing such an act! Please, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, do not insult me with such suspicions."

traits.locale_text: «¡Usted también no! ¡Juro por el Trono Dorado y por la sangre de todos los mártires que ni se me ha pasado por la cabeza cometer semejante fechoría! Por favor, {mf|milord|milady}, no me insulte con semejantes sospechas».

languages.text: “怎么连您都这么说！我以黄金王座与所有殉道者的鲜血起誓，这种事情我根本连想都没想过！求您了，大人，请不要用这样的怀疑来侮辱我。”
languages.original_text: "Not you too! I swear on the Golden Throne and the blood of all martyrs: I never even considered committing such an act! Please, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, do not insult me with such suspicions."

traits.locale_text: “怎么连您都这么说！我以黄金王座与所有殉道者的鲜血起誓，这种事情我根本连想都没想过！求您了，大人，请不要用这样的怀疑来侮辱我。”

languages.text: 「あなたもですか！黄金の玉座とすべての殉教者たちの血に誓って言いますが、そんなことをすることなど考えたこともありません！閣下、どうかそのようなことで私を侮辱しないでください」
languages.original_text: "Not you too! I swear on the Golden Throne and the blood of all martyrs: I never even considered committing such an act! Please, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, do not insult me with such suspicions."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたもですか！黄金の玉座とすべての殉教者たちの血に誓って言いますが、そんなことをすることなど考えたこともありません！閣下、どうかそのようなことで私を侮辱しないでください」

languages.text: "Siz de mi? Altın Taht ve tüm şehitlerin kanı üzerine ant içerim ki böyle bir üçkâğıt, aklımın ucundan bile geçmedi! Rica ediyorum {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, bu tür kuşkularla şahsıma hakaret etmeyin."
languages.original_text: "Not you too! I swear on the Golden Throne and the blood of all martyrs: I never even considered committing such an act! Please, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, do not insult me with such suspicions."

traits.locale_text: "Siz de mi? Altın Taht ve tüm şehitlerin kanı üzerine ant içerim ki böyle bir üçkâğıt, aklımın ucundan bile geçmedi! Rica ediyorum {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, bu tür kuşkularla şahsıma hakaret etmeyin."
